member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.Engine.IPatcherEngine
member.summary: This interface represents the engine with all its core logic behind the AutoPatcher. It contains the public API calls that an external application may access regarding it.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.IPatcherEngine.Patch
member.summary: Performs the required steps in order to try to fully patch M2Bob.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown whenever an external entity tampered any data it shouldn't.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataTamperedException class.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataTamperedException class with a specified error message.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataTamperedException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.EngineConfigs
member.summary: The class with the required configuration to be used by the engine.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.EngineConfigs.M2BOB_PATCH_ROUTER
member.summary: M2Bob's router page, which redirects the browser to the patch metadata file.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.EngineConfigs.M2BOB_PATCH_METADATA
member.summary: The link to M2Bob's metadata file.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.EngineConfigs.MS_TO_WAIT_FOR_AV_FALSE_POSITIVES
member.summary: The time (in milliseconds) that the engine will spend sleeping before performing any consistency checks.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs
member.summary: The class with the required configuration to be used by the downloader.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.MAX_DOWNLOAD_RETRIES_PER_FILE
member.summary: The number of attempts to successfully download a file before throwing a specific Exception.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.INTERVAL_MS_BETWEEN_DOWNLOAD_RETRIES
member.summary: The time (in milliseconds) that the downloader will spend sleeping before retrying a failed download.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.TIMEOUT_MS_WAITING_FOR_READ
member.summary: The time (in milliseconds) that the downloader will spend waiting for the current read request to be completed before closing the stream by force, thus throwing an ObjectDisposedException.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.BUFFER_SIZE
member.summary: The downloader's buffer size, in bytes.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.INFORM_PROGRESS_EVERY_X_READS
member.summary: How many logs to the UI Thread will the downloader always omit between performed reads.
